Name: Hotel Balmoral
Description:
Hotel Balmoral is within 5 minutes' walk of Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station and Passeig de Gràcia boulevard. This boutique hotel offers free access to its wellness area and free Wi-Fi.

Each modern, air-conditioned room at the Balmoral Hotel Barcelona features elegant, functional design. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a minibar.

The hotel has a small wellness area with a sauna, experience shower and fitness machines. It also includes massage cabins and a sun terrace.

Guests receive a free welcome drink between 12:00 and 18:00. You can enjoy a drink in the hotel’s bar, or try bars and restaurants in the popular Gràcia district, a 5-minute walk away. In the morning, a breakfast buffet is served in the hotel.

Hotel Balmoral Barcelona has a TV lounge where you can enjoy sports events on the big screen. There are also 2 computers with internet access.

Gaudí's famous La Pedrera is just a 5-minute walk from the hotel, and the iconic Sagrada Família is 2 km away. Nearby bus and metro connections offer direct access to Plaça Catalunya, the historic city centre and to FC Barcelona's Camp Nou Stadium. Private parking is available in the hotel at an extra cost.

Name: Room Mate Anna
Description:
Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a solarium, Room Mate Anna is set in Barcelona City Centre. The hotel features cutting-edge and modern design as well as personalized service. The hotel serves a daily hot and cold buffet breakfast until midday.

Each stylish, air-conditioned room comes with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day as well as a balcony with views over Casa Batlló. Extras include a wide variety of free toiletries, a hairdryer and safe box.

Name: H10 Casa Mimosa 4* Sup
Description:
Housed in a 19th- century modernist building, just behind La Pedrera, H10 Casa Mimosa offers an impressive chill-out terrace with a plunge pool and a sun lounger area with privileged views of Casa Milà’s terrace.

All rooms are outward-facing, with both views over Pau Claris Street or over the courtyard garden which has Gaudí’s chimneys in the background. All have smart temperature control and high-quality amenities including a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a digital safe box. Some rooms also have spacious terraces.

The on-site El Til•ler Restaurant serves a delicious breakfast with a buffet consisting of natural products and a selection of à la carte dishes. The Lobby Bar also offers light meals and is also an excellent meeting point for a drink.

The beautiful garden retains some former cabins which are located in a courtyard that is typical of the Eixample district; and has a large variety of Mediterranean greenery such as a century-old palm tree, an impressive lime tree and mimosas, which give the hotel’s name. In the garden there is also an elevated swimming pool and a sun lounger area.

From here, there is access to the Las Cocheras meeting room, a former garage with high-ceilings and a capacity up to 100 people.

Ideally located, H10 Casa Mimosa is 10 minutes’ walk from Casa Battló; Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas can be reached within 15 minutes’ walk. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

Name: Hotel Casa Fuster G.L Monumento
Description:
This iconic, Modernist building is located at the head of Barcelona’s chic Passeig de Gracia Avenue. It has a sauna and gym, and a roof terrace with a pool and excellent views.

The luxurious Casa Fuster is a monument in itself, built in 1908 by the Modernist architect, Lluis Domènech i Montaner, and has the status of Speciality Monument. His work, including the hotel, is a designated UNESCO World Heritage Site.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms at Casa Fuster G.L Monumento feature satellite TV and a minibar. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms have a hydro-massage bath.

The Casa Fuster Hotel has a stylish restaurant, which serves Mediterranean cuisine. Room service is available, and there is a jazz bar and rooftop chill-out bar.

There is a concierge service and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

Name: Eco Boutique Hostal Grau
Description:
This family-run hotel is within 200 metres of Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya. All rooms are made of natural, organic materials and painted with PVC-free paint.
All rooms at Hostal Grau have a private bathroom with free toiletries made from natural sources such as lavender. Some rooms have a balcony; while others face a vertical garden.
The whole building features energy efficient lighting and a water recycling system, as well as using renewable or clean energy.
Free natural teas and infusions, are available from the on-site lounge.
The MACBA Modern Art Museum is just 350 metres from the guest house, and Port Vell Harbour is a 15-minute walk away. Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop in nearby Plaza Universitat.

Name: Gallery Hotel 4 Sup
Description:
Located just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, Gallery Hotel 4 Sup offers a free sauna and gym, and a seasonal rooftop terrace with a pool and city views. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and free water on arrival.

This elegant hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms include amenities, a hairdryer and a bathrobe.

The Gallery’s restaurant has an attractive garden terrace where you can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel also has a bar and a café.

Gallery Hotel 4 Sup is situated next to the gardens of Palau Robert, a gallery and tourist information centre. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is a 3-minute walk away, while nearby Diagonal Metro Station provides direct access to the Sagrada Familia. Regular airport trains stop 600 metres away at Passeig de Gracia Station.

Name: Boutique Hostemplo Sagrada Familia
Description:
Offering free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Boutique Hostemplo is located on a pedestrian street just 100 metres from Barcelona's Sagrada Familia. The hotel has a friendly and very peaceful atmosphere.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a kettle in the room. Every room comes with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find a hairdryer and toiletries.

The surroundings are full of bars, restaurants and shops, like the F.C. Barcelona Museum. Las Glorias Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away. Gaudí’s Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes' walk away. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located 2 minutes' walk away, connects you with the city centre in 7 minutes, offering easy access to Plaza Catalunya, the Ramblas and the beach.

You can buy discounted tickets for the tourist bus, which stops 100 metres from the hotel.

The buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local products and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily in our café from 08:00 to 10:30.

Name: Rambla 102

Located just off Las Ramblas and La Boqueria Market, Rambla 102 offers soundproofed accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Central Plaza Catalunya, and Barcelona Cathedral are both 500 metres away.

Modern and bright apartments and lofts with air conditioning and balcony, some with views of the Ramblas. They have a living-dining area with a sofa bed and a flat-screen satellite TV; and come with an open-plan kitchen equipped with a dishwasher, ceramic hobs and kitchenware. There are plenty of bars and tapas restaurants within a 2-minute walk of Rambla 102.

These studio apartments are located next to the Picasso Museum, Santa Caterina Market and in the heart of the bohemian Born and Gothic Quarter. They offer free Wi-Fi.

Apartments in Barcelona Corders are housed in a refurbished building, with a private lift to each apartment. Each stylish studio is decorated in light colours, using traditional materials such as stone and wood. Each studio has a small kitchen corner with a fridge and a hob or microwave.

Name: Sofitel Barcelona Skipper
Description:
The Sofitel Barcelona Skipper offers 5-star luxury next to Barcelona’s Olympic Port. It is just 100 metres from the beach, with free Wi-Fi and 2 outdoor pools.

This modern hotel has spacious bedrooms, with 55' Smart TVs and DVD players. They have an elegant bathroom with rain shower.

The Sofitel Barcelona Skipper has a rooftop pool, with impressive views of the city and sea; and a large seasonal terrace with sun loungers.

The hotel has 2 seasonal cocktail bars; while the Tendiez Bar, a modern bar with an outdoor terrace, is open all year round.

The hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from Ciutadella Vila Olimpica Metro Station, just 2 stops from the historic city centre. Barcelona Zoo and the pretty Ciutadella Park are also nearby.

Name: BCN Apartments 41

Elegant, air-conditioned apartments at BCN Apartments 41 come with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. They are located 500 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia.

The bright, spacious apartments each include a lounge area with sofas. Their kitchenettes are equipped with an oven, microwave and dishwasher.

Name: Sensation Sagrada Familia
Description:
Within 2 minutes’ walk of Gaudí’s Sagrada Família, these bright modern apartments feature a shared rooftop sun terrace and a small outdoor swimming pool with views of the city’s famous Basilica.

Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments feature a balcony and a living room with parquet floors and floor-to-ceiling windows. The modern kitchen is equipped with a hob, oven, coffee maker and dishwasher.

All Sensation Sagrada Familia apartments have free Wi-Fi. There is also a gym and sauna in the same building which can be used free of charge.

There are several cafés, bars and restaurants on the tree-lined Avinguda Gaudí Avenue, just 250 metres away. There are plenty of shops and supermarkets within walking distance, including Mercat Sagrada Família food market, 5 minutes’ walk away.

Sagrada Família metro station, with lines 2 and 5, is just 1 minute walk from the apartments. Line 2 will take visitors to the city centre in 15 minutes. The number 92 bus goes to Gaudí’s Parc Güell, and Barcelona's El Prat Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

Fitted with wooden flooring, each apartment boasts a modern and functional décor. Apartments have a pleasant lounge area with a sofa and floor-to-ceiling windows. Kitchens include a dishwasher, microwave and coffee machine. There is also a Smart TV with keyboard and internet access.

Name: Aparthotel Allada 3*
Description:
Situated in a pedestrianised street in the neighbourhood of Borne, Aparthotel Allada 3* offers a tranquil atmosphere due to the scarcity of street noise and the sound-proofing of the building.

Aparthotel Allada 3* is situated in a picturesque, historical area that has maintained the façades and arches of the 17th century, whilst incorporating the modern architecture of the 21st century. The apartments and studios have been designed to offer the greatest comfort and functionality during your stay. All also benefit from ample natural light throughout the day.

The Borne district is full of winding streets that form a labyrinth, allowing you to find some of the most intriguing areas in the old city. Close to the apartments, you will find the church of Saint Mary, the city gardens, the Picasso museum, the chocolate museum, the Cathedral, the market of Saint Catherine as well as many other sites of interest. In addition, you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum.

Name: Hotel Monegal
Description:
Situated right on the corner of Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas, Hotel Monegal boasts a fantastic central location. It offers good-value rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

Staff at Hotel Monegal’s  can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.
From the Monegal you can walk to Barcelona’s Gothic Cathedral and the modernist Palau de la Musica Auditorium in around 7 minutes. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are both within 20 minutes’ walk.

Buses to and from the airport leave from the other side of Plaza Catalunya, 200 metres away from the hotel.

Name: La Casa Gran B&B
Description:
La Casa Gran is a traditional bed and breakfast set 10 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Gaudi's La Pedrera. It offers suites with free Wi-Fi.

Set in a historic building declared Heritage of Barcelona, La Casa Gran Bed & Breakfast features rooms with private bathroom, private balcony with street views and plenty of natural light. They also have a ceiling fan.

There is a communal living-dining area with tea and coffee facilities. Breakfast is served in the dining room. The owners live on site and can provide assistance for guests 24 hours a day.

You will also find numerous bars, shops and restaurants nearby. The tourist bus stops within 50 metres of the property, and there is a bus with direct connections with the airport. Diagonal and Hospital Clinic Metro stations are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the property.

Name: Sansi Pedralbes
Description:
Peaceful gardens and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and TV are offered at Sansi Pedralbes.

It is just 250 metres from Pedralbes Monastery and 700 metres from UPC University.
IESE University is just 5 minutes walking and ESADE University 200 meters from the hotel.

Decorated in soft blues and browns, this design hotel’s air-conditioned rooms come with a minibar, safe and iron. Bathrooms include toiletries.

Buses to central Barcelona stop within 20 metres of the hotel, and city tour buses stop at Pedralbes Monastery.
Reina Elisenda Station is 800 metres away and Barcelona Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

There are various popular bars and cafés in Sarrià, a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

You can also enjoy a varied breakfast and Catalan cuisine in the Sansi’s elegant restaurant.

A heated indoor pool, saunas and aromatherapy showers are offered in the hotel’s spa, available at an extra cost. Massages can be arranged on request.

Name: Hotel Derby
Description:
Situated 300 metres from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, the Derby is a 20-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou stadium. Each air-conditioned room offers flat-screen satellite TV and free internet access.

The stylish Derby Hotel has an impressive collection of Catalan art, including pieces by Miró and Tàpies. Rooms have functional design and parquet flooring. They all include a safe and a minibar.

Hotel Derby features Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.

Located just 10 metres away, the Gran Derby Hotel allows guests access to its gym and swimming pool. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 800 metres away, while the Feria Trade Fair in Plaza Espanya can be reached in a 20-minute walk.

Name: Hotel Casa Bonay
Description:
Located in central Barcelona, 200 metres from Tetuan Metro Station, Hotel Casa Bonay is a boutique hotel offering a shared terrace and free WiFi throughout. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Set in a 19th-century Neoclassical residential building, all rooms at Hotel Casa Bonay hotel are soundproofed and combine traditional features such as mosaic floors and modern textiles, lighting and furniture. They come with a minibar filled with local refreshments and snacks, complimentary WiFi, premium TV, selected magazines, air conditioning and ceiling fans in most rooms. . The bathroom comes with natural amenities from Mailin+Goetz

Casa Bonay hotel also offers a dynamic and unique culinary experience. Guests will find a rooftop restaurant; Chiringuito TosTao café, Libertine Cocktail Bar and Bodega Bonay's cuisine on site.

Hop on complimentary bikes to take you to the beach club where you will find complimentary boats and paddle boards or join rooftop weekend yoga classes. Sustainability focused.

The popular Passeig de Gracia Street, with shops and restaurants, is 700 metres away.  A 20-minute walk will take you to Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia. Barceloneta Beach is 4 metro stops away from Hotel Casa Bonay.

Aramunt Apartments offers modern, stylish studios 10 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station. It features free Wi-Fi, and a terrace with sun loungers and a small swimming pool of 5,5 metres by 1.

Aramunt offers bright, well-equipped studios for 2 to 4 people, They have air conditioning, a kitchenette with a washer dryer and a dishwasher, a dining area, and a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a double sofa bed. The bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

The property is just a few minutes' walk from numerous tourist attractions. On the nearby Passeig de Gràcia you will find world-famous examples of Modernist architecture, such as Casa Batlló and La Pedrera.

The cultural heart of the Catalan capital, around Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, is just a 10-minute stroll away.

As a guest of the Aramunt Apartments you enjoy free access to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum. Pay public parking can be found next to the property and buses to Barceloneta's beaches stop outside.

Name: Vincci Bit
Description:
Vincci Bit is located just 10 minutes walk from Mar Bella beach. Situated a 7-minute walk from El Maresme Forum Metro Station, it features a sauna, a gym and a rooftop swimming pool with city views.

The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and à la carte meals, including gluten-free products. There is also a lounge, bar and room service available.

The air-conditioned rooms at Vincci Bit are bright and comfortable and feature a flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and a minibar. The private bathrooms include a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is also available.

There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops within a few minutes walk from the hotel. Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away.

The International Convention Centre (CCIB) is a 9-minute walk from Vincci Bit. The historic centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 15-minutes by metro or tram.

Description:
Situated just off famous La Rambla Boulevard in central Barcelona, Hotel Rialto occupies a historic building where the artist Joan Miró was born. It offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV.

Each room at the Rialto Hotel Barcelona has wooden floors and a simple, functional design. The modern bathrooms include basic toiletries. Safes are available to rent.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast and delicious Mediterranean meals at the Rialto’s Miró restaurant. There are also many restaurants and lively bars in the surrounding streets. 

Hotel Rialto’s 24-hour reception offers information about the city. The Boquería Market and Barcelona Cathedral are both within 400 metres. Liceu Metro Station is only 300 metres away, and Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

Name: Miiro Borneta
Description:
Located on Passeig Picasso, Miiro Borneta is set opposite Ciutadella Park. This boutique hotel features a rooftop swimming pool, a restaurant, a comfortable lounge area and a bar with outdoor seating, and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Each modern, air-conditioned room at Miiro Borneta has contemporary décor. There is flat screen HDTV, tea and coffee-making facilities.

Guests can enjoy a breakfast in the Volta Restaurant. Mediterranean cuisine are served for lunch and dinner. There is also Volta Bar with outdoor seating under the arches – the perfect spot for cocktails, natural wines and bar plates, the Gallery – a comfortable lounge area to hang out during the day, a library featuring books on the local neighbourhood and a private dining room..

The hotel is set in the stylish El Born district and is a 5-minute walk from the Picasso Museum. Las Ramblas and the Gothic Quarter are within 1 km of the Miiro Borneta.

Barceloneta and Jaume I Metro Stations can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. Regular buses to La Barceloneta’s beaches stop nearby.

Name: Grand Hyatt Barcelona
Description:
A five star iconic hotel located on the renowned Avenida Diagonal, in the heart of Barcelona's most exclusive residential, financial and shopping district: the Alta Barcelona.

Experience the ultimate luxury, and live where the best of Barcelona lives, where Grand Hyatt chooses to be: a captivating destination within another destination. Combining design with sophistication, it is the most exclusive gastronomical and vibrant destination, for an unparalleled experience.

With 465 rooms including 49 suites and a penthouse, 5 gastronomy spaces, a Wellness & Spa area and an outdoor area with terrace and pool, Grand Hyatt Barcelona is the perfect choice for a lavish and unforgettable getaway.

Designer rooms at Grand Hyatt Barcelona offer home automation technology, a 49-inch Smart TV, a safe, air conditioning and free WiFi. Their private bathroom includes Natura Bissé amenities, bathrobes and slippers. Guests have free access to a bright, modern 24-hour gym with a variety of equipment.

Oasis Spa by Natura Bissé houses more than 1000 m² space for well-being, including water circuits, saunas and steam baths. You can relax with one of the range of treatments available onsite and coordinated by expert therapists. Kindly be informed that the minimum age for entering the Spa is 18.

Grand Hyatt Barcelona is 5-minute walking from Football Club Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium, 400 metres from Maria Cristina Metro Station and the central Plaza España Square is 3 metro stops away. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 15 minutes on foot.

Name: InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel
Description:
Situated 200 metres from Barcelona’s Magic Fountain, the elegant InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel offers spacious rooms with a flat-screen TV and hydromassage shower.

Offering fantastic views over Barcelona, the hotel’s 173 Rooftop Terrace features an outdoor pool, sun loungers, and a dining area where guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine and a selection of drinks and cocktails.

Arrel Restaurant pays homage to the land and the produce it provides throughout all seasons of the year. The restaurant features an open kitchen serving small portions to share, buffet breakfasts and lunch and dinner service.

Quirat Restaurant is an exclusive space that will offer an interpretation of the land and its products through a menu of dishes that responds to the different seasons, designed exclusively for the restaurant by a Chef with 1 Michelin Star. Enjoy an unforgettable dinner in the most exclusive of our restaurants.

Gebre Cocktails and More and, in addition to the cocktail classics, it will offer a menu of artisan signature cocktails that will try to convey a very specific sensory experience connected to the world of the land that surrounds us.

There is free WiFi available in public areas and in rooms and the lobby area at InterContinental Barcelona, an IHG Hotel features a free internet point.

The spa has a water circuit, a dry sauna, a hammam, hot tub, gym, and 6 treatment cabins.

From the hotel, Barcelona’s historic centre can be easily reached by bus or metro. Poble Sec and Espanya Metro Stations are both 500 metres away. Poble Espanyol and the Joan Miró Foundation are 200 metres away.

Name: Monument Hotel
Description:
Located on the fashionable Paseo de Gracia, within 5 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Battló and La Pedrera, Monument Hotel offers luxury services including a gourmet restaurant and a spa.

Elegantly decorated, all soundproofed rooms have a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels, Bluetooth sound system, and a safe deposit box with plug for charging laptop devices. Most of the room types have a private bathroom with a free-standing bath, velour bathrobe and luxury toiletries. Most of the rooms have a balcony with city views.

The 3 Michelin-starred restaurant, Lasarte, offers a range of options designed by the chef Martin Berasategui; while the on-site bistro-style restaurant, Oria, serves fresh cuisine following the Mediterranean gastronomy.

Monument Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas; regular trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Paseo de Gracia Train Station, located 300 metres away. Free high-speed WiFi is provided.

The hotel is housed on Enric Batllo’s house, an architectural jewel of 19th century that constitutes one of the characteristic works of the Eixample Quadrat d'Or and which gives it the Specialty Monument status.

Name: Grand Hotel Central, Small Luxury Hotels
Description:
Grand Central Hotel Barcelona is a design hotel offering fantastic views of the Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral from its rooftop infinity pool. It has stylish rooms and free high-speed WiFi.

The elegantly refurbished hotel is housed in an early 20th-century building and it is a clear example of the Catalan Noucentisme.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Grand Hotel Barcelona have a modern design. They are equipped with a 4K high-definition TV´s with Chromecast . Each one has a bathroom with a large, rain-effect shower and luxury toiletries.

The restaurant offers an authentic Spanish-style dining experience with small "platillos" to be shared, as well as a selection of over 150 local and national wines. An excellent culinary proposal that will make you feel like a local. La Terraza del Central, in the rooftop, is the perfect place to enjoy a dinner, a cocktail or both overlooking the city lights of Barcelona.

The hotel has a fitness centre and massage services are also offered. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, and you can also hire a car or a bicycle.

The Born district, full of stylish shops and restaurants, is just 3 minutes’ walk from the Grand Central Hotel.

The stylish rooms at Mercer Hotel Barcelona have chic décor with original beamed ceilings and exposed brick walls. There is free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom has a rain-effect shower.

The hotel features an interior courtyard with orange trees. There is also a poolside bar and a terrace with loungers.

Several cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the charming, winding streets and pretty squares surrounding the hotel.

Jaume I Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Mercer. The trendy Born district is approximately 300 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral can be reached in 5 minutes by foot.

The bright soundproofed rooms at the Hotel Barcelona Condal Mar are spacious and feature air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Each stylish room has a private bathroom and minibar. There are 2 phone lines.

The Barcelona Condal Mar lobby bar offers a range of cocktails. The bright snack lounge features modern armchairs. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the poolside bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the restaurant.

A special late check-out service, locker and transfer is available during the summer months for an extra cost.

The Barcelona Condal Mar is an 8-minute walk from Maresme Forum Metro Station and  a 2-minute walk from the nearest bus stop. The centre of Barcelona can be reached in around 15 minutes by Metro, Bus or Tram.

Description:
The elegant NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderón has an excellent location just off Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in central Barcelona. It has fitness centre and a year-round free rooftop pool with spectacular city views.

The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderón feature free WiFi, a Nespresso machine and a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower and professional hairdryer.

Room service is also available 24 hours and the Eleven Bar serves cocktails and light snacks.

The breakfast buffet has a variety of high antioxidant dishes and a fresh juice corner. Breakfast can also be requested in your room, and a light early breakfast is available.

Staff in the Guest Relations department can help you throughout your stay and advise you on what to see and do in Barcelona.

The hotel is just one block away from Gaudí’s famous Casa Batlló. You can walk to the city’s Gothic Quarter in about 10 minutes.

Name: Mercer House Bòria BCN
Description:
This chic boutique hotel blends a carefully preserved, 18th-century setting with the most modern and impressive interior design. It lies in the fashionable La Ribera district of central Barcelona.

The Mercer House Bòria BCN is set in amongst the narrow, atmospheric streets just to the north of the famous El Born district. Its original 18th-century façade has been well-preserved and adds to the hotel’s unique charm. Inside, each suite and room has a clean, contemporary style complemented by works of modern art by young local artists.

To get an idea of the Boria’s great location, head to its own rooftop sun terrace, where you can look out over the city’s Gothic cathedral, the beautiful nearby church of Santa María del Mar and the Old Port beyond.

A continental breakfast is served in Hotel Condal’s café-bar. There is a varied selection of restaurants in the streets surrounding the hotel.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona’s many attractions, including the MACBA Museum and Barcelona Cathedral, which can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. The Condal is less than 1 km from Port Vell Marina.

Name: Alguera Apartments Industria
Description:
Offering free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV and a modern kitchen, these stylish apartments are a 10-minute walk from the Sagrada Familia. Sant Pau Hospital, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is just 1 block away.

Every air-conditioned Alguera Industria apartment has 2 bedrooms, each with a private bathroom. All have a living-dining room with double sofa bed, and some have a balcony overlooking the street.

Name: Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
Description:
Located between the stylish Paseo de Gràcia and Rambla de Catalunya, Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton offers a private terrace with an outdoor pool. Plaza Catalunya is 7 minutes' walk away.

Rooms combine modern and vintage furniture and some feature traditional details like mosaic-tiled floors. They have flat-screen TVs, a minibar, hairdryer and free safe. The TVs have over 50, some international channels and free WiFi.

Solomillo Restaurant is a brasserie, offering guests the option of having meat by weight. The modern Charcuteria serves cheese plates, cold cuts and market products, as well as a variety of cocktails. You can also visit the Patio, Terrace & Pool.

Located in the heart of Barcelona, Vincci Gala hotel offers luxurious rooms in a protected 19th-century palace. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The orginal façade, floor and central staircase of this unique hotel have all been preserved, creating a balance of traditional arquitecture and modern design.

The air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries, and bath or shower. The rooms also come with a free laptop safe, extra large beds, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, and a minibar.

A restaurant and snack bar are available on-site, and the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. Laundry and car rental services are available at a surcharge, and the property can provide tourist information.

Vincci Gala hotel is located opposite Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya Square.  There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the surroundings, and you can reach Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes by metro.

Name: Hotel Regina Barcelona
Description:
Hotel Regina Barcelona is set in a historic 19th-century building, just 50 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas. The hotel offers free high-speed WiFi and modern rooms.

The century-old hotel was founded in 1917 and features beautiful architecture, including its impressive art nouveau entrance.

The Hotel Regina Barcelona’s spacious rooms come with air conditioning, central heating and satellite TV. There is free tea and coffee, a safe, work desk and minibar. The private bathroom includes ecological cosmetics and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony.

A varied buffet breakfast with zero-kilometre and homemade products is served. There is also a bar and room service is offered all day from 07:00 to 00:00.

The Regina has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, on Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, are within a 10-minute walk away. Catalunya Metro and Train Station and the airport bus stop are within 5 minutes' walk.

Offering a central location, Barcelona Century Hotel is located in the Eixample district, just a short walk from the Ramblas and Passeig de Gracia. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

All air-conditioned rooms at this hotel are soundproofed and come with satellite TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer.

The hotel offers buffet breakfast as well as a bar. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tourist information about the area.

Barcelona’s main shopping district can be reach within walking distance of the hotel. You can visit Barcelona’s Cathedral or the Gothic Quarter.

Urgell, Hospital Clínic or Universitat Metro Stations are less than 7 minutes’ walk of Barcelona Century Hotel.

Name: Rambla de Mar Apartments
Description:
Rambla de Mar Apartments is designed to ensure you have a stay in Barcelona worthy of being remembered with your family or friends.

Newly renovated, well lit and equipped to make you feel at home, in Rambla de Mar you will get an excellent location and the freedom to organize your stay in the Catalan capital as it best suits you.

Let us share more with you: The spacious living room is equipped to spend the day to day with the greatest possible comfort, its kitchen will allow you to prepare from the simplest to the most sophisticated dish thanks to all its equipment, the rooms are designed for maximum relaxation and featuring a total of 2 private bathrooms per apartment.

Each spacious apartment at Rambla de Mar Apartments has free Wi-Fi, and a living room with a sofa bed, a TV and a dining area.

The entire common area is enabled for people with reduced mobility to move around. You will also have a common terrace/solarium for sunbathing.

The building is located next to the Ramblas, the Port Vell, the Palau Güell and the Liceo. The Cathedral and the Barceloneta beach can be reached on foot. The Drassanes stop on metro line 3 is less than a minute away; Plaça Catalunya is 2 metro stops away, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Espanya are 4 stops away and Sants station is 6 stops away (among others).

Check in is from 16:00h and check out is from 09:00h to 11:30h.

We are a Pet Friendly apartment.

Name: BYPILLOW Ramblas
Description:
BYPILLOW Ramblas is a modern guest house conveniently located in the famous Ramblas in Barcelona, 15 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and the port.

The Wax Museum and the airport bus stop are next to this guest house. The nearest metro station is Drassanes, located only 100 metres away. There is a wide range of monuments, bars and shops within walking distance.

The air-conditioned rooms at BYPILLOW Ramblas come with a TV and private bathroom with shower.

The multilingual staff will be happy to provide tourist information and free local maps. Free WiFi and luggage storage are also offered.

Casa Jam Barcelona is located in the lively and bohemian Grácia neighbourhood in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Parc Güell and 20 minutes' walk from Sagrada Familia Temple. Free WiFi access is available.

This eco-friendly, modern accomodation offers a 24-hour reception and a spacious terrace, where you can relax, park your bike for free and take yoga classes. Guests will also find 2 shared lounges, one with a big and comfortable sofa to chill out and tourist information to plan your visits and the other with a spacious shared kitchen, a dining area, board games and children play room. Digital nomads also will find a working area with a large table.

Rooms and dormitories at Casa Jam Barcelona are air conditioned and have personal lockers or place to store clothes, individual bed lights and plugs for each bed. Luggage storage is available for free. There is also a laundry room and free fairtrade coffee and tea throughout the day. Also there are also cots, baby strollers and high chairs available

The nearest metro station is Joanic, located 450 metres away. Plaza Catalunya Square and Barcelona beaches are 17 minutes by metro. 20 minutes walking you will find the main modernist attractions such as the Sagrada Família and Parc Güell

Name: Hotel Miramar Barcelona GL
Description:
Miramar Barcelona has a picturesque setting within gardens on Montjuïc Mountain, overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. It offers 2 swimming pools, free Wi-Fi and rooms with spectacular views of Barcelona.

Housed in a former palace with a Neucentisme style, the hotel maintains many of the building’s original features and it is one of the symbols of the city. The interiors have chic, contemporary design.

Guests can make use of the on-site fitness centre, or relax by the seasonal outdoor swimming pool. The hotel's L´Occitane Spa features an indoor pool, hot tub, sauna, steam room, pressure showers and treatment cabins.

The hotel has 24-hour room service and a bar with a terrace. Studio Miramar restaurant serves a selection of Catalan and Mediterranean dishes.

Each of the Miramar’s air-conditioned rooms has floor to ceiling windows, a 47-inch TV with international channels and a minibar with a courtesy bottle of water. Their private bathrooms come with L'Occitane toiletries, hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and either a shower or a designer bath tub.

The Joan Miró Foundation, the Old Port and the National Art Museum of Catalonia are within 20 minutes’ walk of the Miramar. And just 10 minutes walk from the Olympic Stadium and Palau Sant Jordi.

Name: Renaissance Barcelona Hotel
Description:
Renaissance Barcelona Hotel is located in the heart of the city, steps away from Passeig de Gràcia, main shopping boulevard, countless bars and restaurants, landmarks and cultural attractions.

The stylish rooms at the Renaissance Barcelona Hotel have been imaginatively designed to offer a standalone destination, perfect for kicking back and recharging after a day exploring Barcelona.

Guest rooms feature a unique stylish Gaudí-inspired décor, parquet floors, luxury bed linens and marbled bathrooms with exclusive toiletries.

The hotel’s stylish Rumbo Bar & Eatery offers Mediterranean dishes using local products. The bar serves signature cocktails, wines and local craft beer. The rooftop, Goja Rooftop is the go-to place to seize the moment, socialize, enjoy delicious Mediterranean food, inventive cocktails and great conversation.

Staff at reception can help you to book tickets for show and guided tours, as well as providing information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both within a 10-minute walk of the Renaissance Barcelona Hotel

The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge and satellite TV.

Name: Hotel Gran Derby Suites, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Description:
This lovely red-brick building is perfectly situated in a quiet area of Barcelona, and boasts an outdoor swimming pool and a fantastic collection of lithographs by Picasso, Dalí, Tàpies and others.

Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Gran Derby Suites features flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer.

These two separate spaces allow guests to comfortably host visitors, hold meetings or work in their sophisticated rooms.

Sit back and relax around the outdoor swimming pool, where you will enjoy views of the pretty gardens.

The tour desk/ticket service and free wired internet make it easy to plan your days in Barcelona.

Take a short metro journey into the city centre, or enjoy the tourist bus, which stops right next to the Gran Derby.

You can also stroll along to the fashionable Avinguda Diagonal. Here you will find the huge L'Illa shopping centre, and a succession of stylish boutiques.

Hotel Gran Derby shares with Hotel Derby the Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and the cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.

Name: Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG Hotel
Description:
The Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG Hotel is located in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, ​​a short walk from the Plaça Catalunya metro station and in the Portal del Angel shopping district and 10 minutes from the Paseo de Gracia shopping area. This elegantly designed property features a Mediterranean restaurant, a cafeteria, a terrace with a bar and a rooftop pool.

All rooms feature contemporary décor. All have a yoga mat, tea and coffee making facilities, smart TV, minibar and exclusive bathrobe.In addition, the hotel offers the Forgot it? We got it! Which makes available to its guests a whole series of amenities and accessories that will further improve their stay.

The gastronomic space of the Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG chain hotel, has a rooftop terrace with magnificent views of the city, pool, sun loungers, cocktails and snacks, Terraza de Vivi. The Fauna restaurant located on the first floor offers Mediterranean cuisine with Catalan roots in a room reminiscent of a typical Eixample apartment. Got Coffee & Cocktails overlooks the street and serves locally sourced coffee, wine and signature cocktails. This gastronomic space is a place where guests feel at home. Every day from 6pm the free Social Wine Hour is offered to all guests with an open bar of local wines.

This pet-friendly hotel is close to attractions such as Barcelona Cathedral, Plaza de Catalunya and the Palau de la Música Catalana. Barcelona-El Prat Airport, located 15 km away, is the closest.

Our clients say that this part of Barcelona is their favorite, according to independent comments.

Name: Hotel El Palace Barcelona
Description:
Hotel El Palace Barcelona is located in Eixample District, close to the Ramblas, the main shopping area and Barcelona’s main tourist attractions. It offers a Mayan-style luxury spa. A limousine service with a chauffeur is available on request.

Opened in 1919, this hotel features a neo-classical façade and stylish air-conditioned rooms with classic decor. Each room is spacious and comes with satellite TV, desk, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers.

There are 2 restaurants: L'Éclair, located at the hall, and the Winter Garden Restaurant, set at the Roof Terrace; guests can also enjoy a cocktail at the Bluesman Cocktail Bar.

Hotel El Palace Barcelona has a Mayan-style spa with a Temazcal Sauna. Other facilities at this hotel include both fitness and business center and an outdoor pool.

Third person sharing in room is available for Superior room, Junior Suite and Superior Suite.

Staff at Hotel El Palace Barcelona can provide information about the area. Passeig de Gràcia Metro and Railway Station as well as Urquinaona Metro station are less than 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are approximately 15 minutes’ walk away.

Name: Le Meridien Barcelona
Description:
Located in the vibrant center of Barcelona, Le Méridien Barcelona offers the perfect base for exploring the city’s rich culture and iconic landmarks. With major attractions such as La Rambla, the Gothic Quarter, and the famous Boquería Market just steps away, guests can easily immerse themselves in the city's dynamic energy.

Our 191 luxury guest rooms and 40 suites offer breathtaking city views, with six distinct categories of suites tailored to the needs of every traveler. From family suites to those featuring expansive terraces, corner suites with stunning views of La Rambla, and our exclusive Presidential Suite boasting panoramic vistas of the entire city, each suite provides a luxurious retreat designed to make your stay as comfortable and memorable as possible.

Indulge your palate at CentOnze Restaurant, where creatively reinterpreted local flavors await in a cosmopolitan yet relaxed setting. Enjoy expertly crafted cocktails and coffees at Signature Bar and Longitude Bar.

Le Méridien Barcelona serves a varied, international breakfast. The CentOnze restaurant provides creative Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails, prepared with fresh ingredients from the nearby Boquería Market, as well as music and impressive views of La Rambla.

Rejuvenate at our Explore Spa Studio, a sanctuary of serenity offering beautiful city views from the terrace. Our 24-hour gym is equipped with the latest technology, allowing you to stay fit at any time of the day.

Experience the charm and luxury of Le Méridien Barcelona, where warmth and sophistication await at every turn.

Name: Claris Hotel & Spa GL, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Description:
Located just off Barcelona’s prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, this luxury hotel offers city views from its rooftop pool. It also has a unique art collection.

Built in a converted 19th century palace, Claris Hotel & Spa GL combines the classicism of the original place with modern materials and it has over 400 original pieces of art on display, giving it the Specialit Monument status. It offers free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum, located next door.

The smart, soundproofed bedrooms feature stylish décor and hand-made furniture. Each one comes with LCD satellite TV, sofa and pieces of Roman, Egyptian and Hindu artwork.

The hotel’s Terraza del Claris Restaurant serves gourmet Mediterranean food on the roof terrace overlooking the characteristic rooftops of the Eixample quarter. The Os-kuro Sushi & Robata Restaurant offers classic recipes from Japanese gastronomy combined with Mediterranean ingredients and local produce.

All TV in rooms feature ChromeCast offering connectivity to platforms such as Netflix, Amazon Prime, Youtube, etc.

The Claris is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The Ramblas is around 10 minutes’ walk away.
